data.event: Colton was first settled in 1879 by J.A. Cole, and was founded in 1882 by J.B. Stanley. Colton was incorporated in 1890 however it was not recorded until 1893.

Colton was first settled in 1879 by J.A. Cole, and was founded in 1882 by J.B. Stanley. Colton was incorporated in 1890 however it was not recorded until 1893.
In 2014 the Colton WIldcat boys won the first basketball State Championship in school history The Colton Wildcat girls have won 8 consecutive 1B state basketball championships (2009-2016).
